"PSE":
"PSE stands for \"Photon Sensitive Effect\".

Defeating enemies and completing Trials will raise the PSE Level in the area."

"As the PSE Level increases, rare enemies become more likely to appear, and when the PSE Level reaches its maximum, a PSE Burst will occur.

During a PSE Burst, a large number of enemies will rush in to attack players, culminating in the appearance of a boss enemy."

"Defeating enemies marked by Enemy Markers and completing Trials marked by Trial Markers make a PSE Burst more likely to occur.

â€»Note that the PSE Level will be reset when you exit a Section."
